Class oracle.html.SimpleItem

Class oracle.html.SimpleItem 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.SimpleItem
public class SimpleItem
extends Item
Description:

The SimpleItem class provides an object wrapper for any simple (Text String based) Html Element. Since this class derives from Item class, most phrase markup capability is built-in.

Instructions:

Use this class whenever you need to put a string with markup in your page.

Example: 

// Creates a SimpleItem with String "HelloWorld!" (and BOLD it)
SimpleItem s = new SimpleItem("HelloWorld!").setBold();

See Also:
